about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm Pablo Garay, a passionate fullstack developer with a rocker's soul. I love building robust APIs, clean architectures, and beautiful interfaces. Curious, self-taught, and always ready for the next challenge. When I'm not coding, you'll find me playing guitar, gaming, or exploring new technologies.

timeline.title: Passionate About Computing
timeline.desc: Since I was a child, technology and logic have fascinated me. I always wanted to understand how things work and how to create them.

timeline.title: Computer Science Student
timeline.desc: Formal training in computer science, where I built a solid foundation and discovered my passion for software development.

timeline.title: Fullstack Developer
timeline.desc: First real projects, learning to connect frontend and backend, and working in teams to create complete products.

timeline.title: Backend-Oriented Fullstack Developer
timeline.desc: Specialized in backend, APIs, and clean architectures, without neglecting design and user experience.

timeline.title: Gamer, Rocker & Explorer
timeline.desc: Music, video games, and a curiosity for learning new things are essential parts of my life and creativity.

works.stack: My projects showcase a diverse tech stack

codeBakery.name: Code Bakery
codeBakery.summary: E-commerce platform as final project at Soy Henry bootcamp.
description: Developed an online sales platform as the final project in the Soy Henry bootcamp, applying Scrum methodology in a collaborative environment.
The project involved building a dynamic frontend, efficient backend, and robust database integration.
highlightLists: Integrated modern technologies into software development.

todoList.name: Todo List
todoList.summary: Simple and functional app to organize daily tasks.
description: A straightforward application designed to efficiently organize daily tasks.
Developed with a focus on simplicity and usability.
highlightLists: Add, edit, and delete tasks effortlessly.
Keep a clear record of pending tasks.

weatherApp.name: Weather App
weatherApp.summary: Web app providing real-time weather updates for any location.
description: A web application that provides real-time weather updates for any location worldwide.
Developed using knowledge gained from the Soy Henry bootcamp.
highlightLists: Search by city for current weather details.
View temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit.
See humidity, wind speed, and weather conditions.

gameOfLife.name: Game of Life
gameOfLife.summary: Interactive simulation based on John Conway's Game of Life.
description: An app to explore how life begins and evolves through an interactive simulation.
A fun and educational way to learn about artificial life and mathematical simulations.
highlightLists: Cellular automation based on John Conway's Game of Life.
Dynamic evolution: watch cells live, die, and form patterns.
Interactive controls: start, pause, and reset the simulation.

jobs.title: Work Experience
jobs.subtitle: I have worked in various companies, contributing my skills in full stack development

description.title: Back-End Developer (Mid-level)
description: E-commerce Back-End: I designed and built the backend of an online store‚Äîeverything that happens behind the buy button. I used modern tools to ensure the site was fast, secure, and scalable.
Management App: I led the creation of an admin panel so the team could manage users, orders, and more, clearly and efficiently. I made sure it was intuitive and fast, using current web technologies.
Beyond coding, I contributed ideas to help the team work better and to improve the final product's quality. I'm always looking for ways to optimize what we do.
When problems arose, I not only solved them but also proposed strategic solutions to prevent them from happening again. I work with commitment to ensure projects reach a successful outcome.
skills: Back-End: Node.js, NestJS, TypeScript, MongoDB, mySQL.
Tools & Practices: Agile methodologies, CI/CD, REST APIs.
Performance optimization, scalable architecture, team leadership.

description.title: Full Stack Developer (Mid-level)
description: Call Center: I helped optimize a call center platform used by thousands of employees. I improved its performance by 70%, making it faster, more stable, and more efficient for daily users.

Traffic Ticket Management: I developed from scratch a set of web applications to automate traffic ticket management in Argentina. I implemented a microservices-based system that allows each part of the process to be controlled in an agile and scalable way.
skills: Back-End: Node.js, NestJS, GraphQL, TypeScript, mySQL.
Tools & Practices: Agile methodologies, CI/CD, REST & GraphQL APIs.
Performance optimization, scalable architecture, team leadership.
